# buildDefaultMap() function

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function buildDefaultMap(sdkOptions?: SDKOptions): Record<
  number,
  {
    rpc: string[];
    chainId: number;
    nativeCurrency: {
      symbol: string;
      name: string;
      decimals: number;
    };
  }
>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter  | Type                              | Description       |
| ---------- | --------------------------------- | ----------------- |
| sdkOptions | [SDKOptions](./sdk.sdkoptions.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> |

**Returns:**

Record&lt;number, { rpc: string\[\]; chainId: number; nativeCurrency: { symbol: string; name: string; decimals: number; }; }&gt;
